Security ManagerÂ¶

The Security Manager application is main application to manage FireMon resources, devices, and data.

This application is where the bulk of the data and logic is located.

  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.access_path
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.centralsyslogconfigs
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.centralsyslogs
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.collectionconfigs
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.collectors
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.deviceclusters
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.devicegroups
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.devicepacks
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.devices
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.elasticsearch
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.license
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.logging
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.maps
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.revisions
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.routes
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.rulerec
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.siql
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.users
  • firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.zones

FireMon-API is a Python web wrapper for the FireMon SIP (Security Mangager, etc...) APIs. The intent is make something that is useful for quick and easy development against FireMon products.
